value:
Look at all of these cute girls! One
of them HAS to be my dream girl...
I just know it!

Shinon always keeps me busy with
one thing or another. We're never in
the same place for long.

That's a furrowed brow if I've ever
seen one! So here's my advice:
don't sweat the small stuff, OK?

This is it... This is the day I meet my
dream girl. Oh, er... Hi there! I'm
looking for love. Didn't you know?

Shinon said I should polish my armor
until I can see my face in it. Man, it's
hard work looking cool for the ladies!

The name's Gatrie. Got a delivery
from $Nf.

My fated love is waiting for me!
Until then, I can't lose!

You see that? Better pick your jaw
up off the ground, because I'm just
getting started!

Oof. A sorry performance like that,
well... It'll put a dent in my pay as
well as my pride.

This'll show the ladies how strong
and manly I am! And help in a fight
too, I guess.

Hey there. I'm Gatrie. What do you
need? We can bash heads or trade
dating tips. You tell me!

You won't believe this, but I did it!
Let me regale you with the ultimate
tale of your old pal Gatrie's love life...$k$pI met this cutie selling flowers on my
way home from the pub. It was love
at first sight, I tell ya!$k$pShe said she was working day and
night to support her bedridden pa, so
I emptied my pockets then and there.$k$pYou should have seen the look on her
face! And now...we're gettin' hitched
when she returns with the old man!$k$pShould be in about...say, six months. I
can work for you till then, right? What
a time to be alive! Ha ha ha!
でやあっ
うおー！
ぐあっ
まいったな…
Easy!
I'm ready to fight!
You can always count on me!
Won't even break a sweat!
I feel...so weak...
Hee hee hee...
I'm Gatrie. But I'm sure you already knew that.
Finally got your attention, huh?
There are so many lovely ladies in this army!
Hey, you. Yeah, you! Name's Gatrie. What's yours?
I had the honor to serve under Greil -- Ike's father. Ike's not a bad person, by any means. But he has no manners whatsoever...
The easygoing life of a mercenary is the only life for me.
I'll always protect you. This armor isn't just for show, you know.
Hope you've got a plan.
What do we do?
I've got it!
